Class Command

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.runtime.commands.Command
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommand

    public class Command
extends Object
implements ICommand
    Represents a command that implements a command pattern

    • Constructor Detail

      • Command

        public Command(IComponent component,
               String name,
               Schema schema,
               ICommandFunction function)
        Creates a command instance
        Parameters:
        component - a component this command belongs to
        name - the name of the command
        schema - a validation schema for command arguments
        function - an execution function to be wrapped into this command.

                      DynamicMap args)
               throws MicroserviceError
        Executes the command given specific arguments as an input.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface ICommand
        Parameters:
        correlationId - a unique correlation/transaction id
        args - command arguments
        Returns:
        execution result.
        Throws:
        MicroserviceError - when execution fails for whatever reason.

      • validate

        Performs validation of the command arguments.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface ICommand
        Parameters:
        args - command arguments
        Returns:
        a list of errors or empty list if validation was successful.
